Powers.DescLong: The Fortunata Blood Widow is resistant to Psionic Damage, as well as Sleep, Hold, Immobilization and Disorient effects. They have improved Defense and Accuracy.
The poison on the blade is slowly damaging you and slowing your attacks and movement speed.
You are poisoned!  Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.
You have been hit by a Poison Dart.  You cannot Regenerate you wounds while you take damage from this poison.
